TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 、、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类在 、、和 方法中使用，以提供对由 控件调用的方法所引发的输出参数、返回值和异常的访问。The class is used in the , , , and methods to provide access to output parameters, return values, and exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control. 它们分别由 、和 属性访问。These are accessed by the , , and properties, respectively. 通过添加委托来处理 、、或 事件，可以检查此数据并执行所需的任何其他 post 处理。By adding a delegate to handle the , , , or events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing that is required. 控件公开了许多事件，你可以处理这些事件，以便在其生命周期中的不同时间使用基础业务对象。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出了事件以及关联的 类和事件处理程序委托。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |ㄆンEvent|EventArgsEventArgs|EventHandlerEventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

在创建业务对象的实例之前立即发生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在创建业务对象的实例之后立即发生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在检索数据之前发生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

在执行插入、更新或删除操作之前发生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |。.

在检索数据后发生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

完成插入、更新或删除操作后发生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在销毁业务对象之前发生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示一组所有雇员，使用由 属性指定的方法从 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中检索数据。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则使用 属性指定的方法以及在 集合中指定的任何参数执行 操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，在与员工 ID 相对应的 集合中指定一个参数。In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the employee ID. 这是因为，虽然 ID 作为 对象包含在 集合中，但它将以字符串的形式传递到 控件。This is because although the ID is included in the collection as a object, it will be passed as a string to the control. 通过将其显式添加到 集合，并将其 属性设置为 值，它将以整数形式（而不是字符串）将 传递到方法。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property set to the value, it will pass correctly by the to the method as an integer, rather than as string. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托在执行 操作之前处理 事件，并调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 操作完成后的 事件，以处理可能已发生的任何异常。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to handle any exceptions that might have occurred. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托可访问使用 对象的业务对象引发的可能异常。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate accesses possible exceptions that are thrown by the business object that is using the object. 在此示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则它由此委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 下面的列表描述了代码示例中定义的两个主要类：The following list describes the two major classes that are defined in the code example: - `EmployeeLogic` 类是不维护状态并封装业务逻辑的类。The `EmployeeLogic` class is a class that does not maintain state and encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee` 类是一个模型类，其中只包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能。The `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 此外，还提供了一个 `NorthwindDataException` 类作为便捷。In addition, a `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 这组示例类使用 Northwind 商贸数据库，这是一个可用于 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 的示例数据库。This set of example classes uses the Northwind Traders database, which is an example database that is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 对于完整的工作示例，你必须将此代码编译为库，然后从 ASP 页中使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. 在前面的示例中提供的 ASP 页配置为使用此类库。The ASP page that is provided in the preceding example is configured to work with this class library. 不完全实现 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法，因此当您试验此示例时，不会将数据插入 Northwind 商贸数据库中。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的输出参数和返回值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified output parameters and return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `returnValue` 参数可以是通过调用业务对象数据方法返回的任何对象。The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method. `outputParameters` 参数是名称/值对的 集合，这些名称/值对与方法签名中的匹配，并按引用传递。The `outputParameters` parameter is an collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object returnValue, class System.Collections.IDictionary outputParameters, class System.Exception exception) cil managed
Public Sub New (returnValue As Object, outputParameters As IDictionary, exception As Exception)

summary.span: 使用指定的输出参数、返回值和异常初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified output parameters, return value, and exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `returnValue` 参数可以是通过调用业务对象数据方法返回的任何对象。The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method. `outputParameters` 参数是名称/值对的 集合，这些名称/值对与方法签名中的匹配，并按引用传递。The `outputParameters` parameter is an collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference. `exception` 参数是一个 异常，该异常包装在数据操作过程中由 控件调用的方法所引发的任何异常。The `exception` parameter is an exception that wraps any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control during a data operation. 如果异常不是由 、、或 方法处理的，则在数据操作返回后，由 控件引发。If the exception is not handled by an , , , or method, it is thrown by the control after the data operation returns.

summary.span: 获取或设置受数据操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows that are affected by the data operation.

value.span: 受数据操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 值验证预计的行数是否受影响。Use the value to verify that the expected number of rows was affected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取在数据操作期间由 控件调用的方法所引发的任何异常的包装。

span.span: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control during a data operation.

value.span: 一个 ，将业务对象引发的任何异常包装到其 内。

span.span: An that wraps any exceptions thrown by the business object in its .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异常不表示业务对象数据方法引发的实际异常。The exception does not represent the actual exception that is thrown by the business object data method. 您可以使用 属性访问引发的异常。You can use the property to access the thrown exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示一组所有雇员，使用由 属性指定的方法从 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中检索数据。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则使用 属性指定的方法以及在 集合中指定的任何参数执行 操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托在执行 操作之前处理 事件，并调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 操作完成后的 事件，从而执行任何异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to perform any exception handling. 在此示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则由 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate. 若要检查此代码示例使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 中间层业务对象的实现，请参阅 中的类概述。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示业务对象引发的异常是否已得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was thrown by the business object has been handled.

value.span: 如果业务对象引发的异常已得到处理并且不应由 引发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an exception thrown by the business object has been handled and should not be thrown by the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果业务对象引发异常，则 属性设置为 `false`，并且该异常由 属性包装。If the business object throws an exception, the property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the property. 如果使用 对象，则可以检查 属性并处理异常。If you use an object, you can check the property and handle the exception. 如果处理异常，请将 属性设置为 `true` 或 控件将引发异常。If you handle the exception, set the property to `true` or the control will throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示一组所有雇员，使用由 属性指定的方法从 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中检索数据。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则使用 属性指定的方法以及在 集合中指定的任何参数执行 操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托在执行 操作之前处理 事件，并调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 操作完成后的 事件，以处理可能已发生的任何异常。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to handle any exceptions that might have occurred. 在此示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则由 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate. 若要检查此代码示例使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 中间层业务对象的实现，请参阅 中的类概述。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含业务对象方法参数及其值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.

value.span: 表示业务对象方法参数及其相应值的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过引用传递给业务对象方法的任何参数都将在 集合中返回。Any parameters that are passed to the business object method by reference are returned in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReturnValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ReturnValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取由业务对象方法（如果有）作为对象返回的返回值。

span.span: Gets the return value that is returned by the business object method, if any, as an object.

value.span: 一个对象，表示由业务对象方法返回的返回值；否则为 （如果该业务对象不返回值）。

span.span: An object that represents the return value returned by the business object method; otherwise, , if the business object method returns no value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在 构造函数中设置。The property is set in the constructor. 该值设置为使用反射调用的业务对象方法调用的返回值。The value is set to the return value of the business object method call, which is called using reflection. 如果业务方法未返回任何值（例如，当业务对象方法返回 `void`）时， 属性的计算结果为 `null`。If the business method returns no value (such as when the business object method returns `void`), the property evaluated to `null`.
